articles.content: OTTAWA - Canadian health authorities are keeping a watchful eye on European investigations of the Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine after reports of blood clots following inoculations, but say there is no e… [+6068 chars]
articles.description: Canadian health authorities are keeping a watchful eye on European investigations of the Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine after reports of blood clots following inoculations, but say there is no evidence they were caused by the vaccine.
articles.title: No sign Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine causes blood clots: Canadian health authorities - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
